articles.title: Kate Beckinsale reveals she is 'absolutely broken' after death of beloved cat Clive - Daily Mail
articles.description: Kate Beckinsale revealed she is absolutely devastated over the death of her beloved cat, Clive, who she first brought home more than a decade ago.
articles.content:
